text: Sébastien Lareau and Daniel Nestor were the defending champions, but did not compete this year. Paul Haarhuis and Sjeng Schalken won the title by defeating Petr Pála and Pavel Vízner 6–2, 3–6, 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Draw=== ==References== * Main Draw (ATP) * Qualifying Draw (ATP) Category:Kingfisher Airlines Tennis Open Category:2000 ATP Tour
title: 2000 Heineken Open Shanghai – Doubles
